subject: AI & Agents
title: Open Source vs Closed Models
description: A fast breakdown of Open Source vs Closed Models for builders.

hook.text: Should you use GPT-4 or Llama? It depends on control, cost, and compliance.

buildup.text: Closed models (GPT-4, Claude) offer convenience but you depend on the provider.

discovery.text: Open models (Llama, Mistral) let you self-host, fine-tune, and own the stack.

twist.text: Open models need infra expertise. Closed models have vendor lock-in. Pick your tradeoff.

climax.text: Many teams use closed for prototyping, then switch to open for production cost control.

punchline.text: Open for control. Closed for speed. Both for strategy.

quiz.question: What's an advantage of open-source models?
options: You can self-host and fine-tune them
